name: DownTown Hunt
description:
Welcome to Downtown Hunt! A traditional rpg made purely for fun! Join Marq in his wacky adventure where lots of random stuff happens as he finds new people that joins his party!

This game it's an earthbound fangame(kind of). I really like earthbound so i wanted to make a game like earthbound with my characters just for fun. Also it's supposed to be kinda goofy, so don't take everything toooooo seriously.

Features:

Every enemy has its own battle music (kinda)

Turn-based battles

GRINDING? LEVELS? WHAT'S THAT? That's right, there are no levels in the game, so intead of overlevelling yourself to win, you have to rely on strategy.

You unlock new skills by defeating special bosses! (there are none in the demo,though)

A soundtrack made of Mother 3 and some Pokémon music,except that they've been remade with updated instruments!

Credits:

Tileset Add-ons: Avery

Item Icons: Avery

Enemies: Ækashics

Damage numbers: KaelCat

Battle backgrounds: They're from mother 3 too lol

Dialogue Box Character Icons: Made by my dear friend SpookySat!

Main Characters: Made by me :D

Estimated Release Date: June 2021 or earlier

You should also check out the gamejolt page!

https://gamejolt.com/games/dthunt/593197
